short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms Chrome new tabs into memopads. Type, edit, and save text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ideal for jotting down notes. Only stores text locally, without any external tracking or storage.

★ Features ★
- Works offline
- Autosaves text
- Curated themes
- Custom web fonts
- Lightweight (~30 KiB) and only "Vanilla JS"
